resources.string:
Hi, my name is Emanuel. 

I love Grilled pork. 

Im 23 years old and Im studying computer Engineering. 
I have a couple of work experience, i was working as a software developer in a company from Costa Rica. 

I like drinking beers while Im eating chicken wings. 
And sometimes I like playing video games such as fifa 2022 online. 
Right now Im working as a tech support engineer from a company in Nicaragua. 

Once, when was my last graduation, I woke up with Chikungunya, at that moment I said What a pity. 
 but despite everything I went to my high school and I spent a good moment with my classmates. 

I'll be happy to help to my mother and my family.
